pages.text: Just Enough Items is the surface when you open your Invetar. It shows you all available items, their recipes, occurrences and other informations.

pages.title: Searchbox
pages.text: $(li)$(bold)@$() searches for all items in a specific mod$(br)$(li)$(bold)#$() searches for all the items with a certain tooltip$(br)$(li)$(bold)%$() searches for all the items in a certain creative tab$(br)$(li)$(bold)$$() searches for all the items with a certain tag$(li)$(bold)-$() in front of a term filters this term out$(br)You can combine multiple terms.

pages.title: Item Informations
pages.text: In the list you can simple left click on a item to show the recipe or/and informations and right click to show the uses.$(br)If you hover over an item you can simple press $(k:jei.showRecipe) to show the recipes or/and informations and $(k:jei.showUses) to show the uses.

pages.title: Bookmarks
pages.text: If you hover over an item and press $(k:jei.bookmark) you can simply bookmark the item. It will then be listed in the inventory menu on the left. To remove it, simply hover over the item again and press $(k:jei.bookmark).
